scripts.prepare-sushiswap-arbitrum: mustache ./config/sushiswap-arbitrum.json subgraph.minichef.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-sushiswap-celo: mustache ./config/sushiswap-celo.json subgraph.minichef.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-sushiswap-mainnet: cp subgraph.mainnet.yaml subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-sushiswap-polygon: mustache ./config/sushiswap-polygon.json subgraph.minichef.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-sushiswap-xdai: mustache ./config/sushiswap-xdai.json subgraph.minichef.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.deploy-sushiswap-arbitrum: npm run prepare-sushiswap-arbitrum && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ gvladika/simplefi-sushiswap-farms-arbitrum
scripts.deploy-sushiswap-celo: npm run prepare-sushiswap-celo && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ gvladika/simplefi-sushiswap-farms-celo
scripts.deploy-sushiswap-mainnet: npm run prepare-sushiswap-mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ gvladika/simplefi-sushiswap-farms
scripts.deploy-sushiswap-polygon: npm run prepare-sushiswap-polygon && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ gvladika/simplefi-sushiswap-farms-polygon
scripts.deploy-sushiswap-xdai: npm run prepare-sushiswap-xdai && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ gvladika/simplefi-sushiswap-farms-xdai
